Plot: The Man in the Yellow Hat is an oddball museum employee who looks after his pet monkey - an inquisitive and wonderful creature whose enthusiasm often gets the best of him.
Title: Curious George
Writer: Ken Kaufman (screenplay), Ken Kaufman (story), Mike Werb (story), Margret Rey (books), H.A. Rey (books)
Actors: Frank Welker, Will Ferrell, Shane Baumel, Timyra-Joi Beatty
tomatoConsensus: Curious George is a bright, sweet, faithful adaptation of the beloved children's books.
